<!-- Do not edit this file. It is automatically generated by API Documenter. -->

[@log-right/base](./base.md)

## base package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [ConfigurationManagerBase](./base.configurationmanagerbase.md) | A static class used to manage the log-right configuration data |
|  [ResultBase](./base.resultbase.md) | A class used to handle the result of a function call or sub-process. Functions/process should return back this object so that the calling function can evaluate it's success. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Event\_2](./base.event_2.md) | Data used to identify a specific system event |
|  [EventConfig](./base.eventconfig.md) | Configuration parameters to be applied to a specific event type |
|  [FormattedData](./base.formatteddata.md) | The base interface definition for <code>FormattedData</code>, the data generated on the <code>Report</code> instance when the <code>format</code> method is ran |
|  [Indexable](./base.indexable.md) | A default dictionary type that can be indexed via a string |
|  [IResult](./base.iresult.md) | The base interface definition for the <code>Result</code> class |
|  [Report](./base.report.md) | The base interface definition for <code>Report</code> |
|  [ReportConfigBase](./base.reportconfigbase.md) | <code>Report</code> configuration parameters to be applied to a specific event type |
|  [ResultConfigBase](./base.resultconfigbase.md) | Result object configuration parameters to be applied to a specific event type |
|  [TypedIndexable](./base.typedindexable.md) | A default dictionary type that can be indexed via a string and containing specific values |
|  [UserConfig](./base.userconfig.md) | Configuration data that is specific to the current, active user |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [captureStringToConsole](./base.capturestringtoconsole.md) | A method to write message directly to the console |
|  [captureToConsole](./base.capturetoconsole.md) | A method to capture <code>Report</code> events directly to the console |
|  [DefaultEventTypes](./base.defaulteventtypes.md) |  |
|  [DefaultLogEventConfigBase](./base.defaultlogeventconfigbase.md) |  |
|  [DefaultLogRightConfigBase](./base.defaultlogrightconfigbase.md) |  |
|  [DefaultUserConfigBase](./base.defaultuserconfigbase.md) | Configuration data that is specific to the current, active user |
|  [formatBase](./base.formatbase.md) | A helper function that will handle converting the <code>Result</code> objects returned from a failed process into a <code>Report</code> |
|  [getConfig](./base.getconfig.md) | An internal function used by the ConfigurationManager to get the configuration object |
|  [isErrorObject](./base.iserrorobject.md) | A type-check function to verify if the passed in field is an Error object |
|  [isResultBase](./base.isresultbase.md) | A type-check function to verify if the passed in field is a Result object |
|  [setConfig](./base.setconfig.md) | An internal function used by the ConfigurationManager to get the configuration object |
|  [SeverityTypes](./base.severitytypes.md) | The potential values of the severity field. Higher values indicate a more damaging event. If the severity is NONE (or 0), the condition will never be be met. If the severity is CRITICAL (or 99), the condition will always be be met. |

## Type Aliases

|  Type Alias | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [CallbackFunction](./base.callbackfunction.md) | The function definition for any implementations of <code>callback</code>. This function is user-defined, and will be called when a specified result is called. |
|  [CaptureFunctionBase](./base.capturefunctionbase.md) | The function definition for any implementations of <code>capture</code>. Custom user-defined methods should be sure to align with this. |
|  [DefaultEventType](./base.defaulteventtype.md) | The event types provided by default by <code>log-right</code> |
|  [EventType](./base.eventtype.md) |  |
|  [FormatFunctionBase](./base.formatfunctionbase.md) | The function definition for any implementations of <code>format</code>. Custom user-defined methods should be sure to align with this. |
|  [LogEventConfigBase](./base.logeventconfigbase.md) | A type to represent a full log event sequence: - 1. A Result is returned from a function or process - 2. The Result is used to create (or format) a Report - 3. The Report is captured to help identify an issue or a more general event |
|  [LogRightConfigBase](./base.logrightconfigbase.md) | Specifications for the base level of configuration parameters log-right accepts |
|  [ResultBaseParams](./base.resultbaseparams.md) | Parameters that can be passed into the <code>ResultBase</code> class's constructor to initialize an object |
|  [Severity](./base.severity.md) | The potential values of the <code>severity</code> field. Higher values indicate a more damaging event. If the severity is <code>NONE</code> (or 0), the condition will never be be met. If the severity is <code>CRITICAL</code> (or 99), the condition will always be be met. |
